code:
%% Translatable Attachments flow
flowchart LR
  subgraph DB[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    A[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
  end

  M[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> A

  Init[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
  Init -->|require backend| B[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
  Init -->|register backend| Mobility[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

  B -->|provides| Apply[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

  ModelCanonical[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
  ModelDSL[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

  ModelCanonical --> Apply
  ModelDSL --> Apply

  Apply -->|defines associations| Assoc[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
  Apply -->|defines accessors| Accessors[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

  View[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
  View -->|uploads per-locale| Controller

  Controller[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] -->|permits locale params or maps| Model
  Model -->|writer methods| ActiveStorage[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
  ActiveStorage --> A

  Serve[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] -->|serves blob| UserBrowser[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

  Accessors -->|getter fallback| Fallback[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
  Fallback --> ActiveStorage

  classDef infra fill:#f8f9fa,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
  class DB,Init,B,Apply,Assoc,Accessors,View,Controller,ActiveStorage,Serve,Fallback infra;
